result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicholas M. Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: $579.00 due in 60 days or 5 days KCJ or 5 days work crew.

Minutes:  Judge Dreyfus acting for Branch 3.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Drew Lehman appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person pro se.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Deft fined $100 plus costs.  60 DTP.  In default, 5 days work crew or 5 days KCJ.  DNA ordered.  Appeal rights.
Time of FPT changed on 6/15 from 9:30am to 1:15pm.  Deft has no license, resides in Green Bay area - has to take the bus down here.  Email sent to DA's office.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No drug paraphenalia  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Any Double Tree Hotel in Kenosha Co., Carmen B, Ashleigh K, Nathaniel L.

01:49 PM    State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Benjamin Schwarz.  Clerk: P. Pfeuffer.  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 02:15 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury selection scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.  $500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  ts
